com.facebook.buck.rules

Class ArchivingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractCachingBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.rules.ArchivingRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NativeLibraryRule

    public abstract class ArchivingRule
extends AbstractCachingBuildRule
    Base class for rules which produce an archive of files.

        public boolean isPackagingRule()
        Specified by:
        isPackagingRule in interface BuildRule
        Returns:
        whether or not this rule is considered a packaging rule. Packaging rules (like java_binary) are rules that package up all of their transitive dependencies in their final output.
